about_the_game:
Beyond the Outbreak is a survival game where you and your friends have to fight various enemies in a post-apocalyptic world. Scavenge for supplies, craft essential tools, cook, and arm yourself to fight relentless foes. Take control of vehicles to explore landscapes, or construct fortified strongholds to defend your territory.

Vehicles

With the right car, you can drive through hazardous regions much faster, minimizing your exposure to enemies and reducing the time spent in high-risk zones. Cars are limited in fuel and require maintenance, adding an extra layer of strategy as you plan your routes and keep an eye on fuel reserves.

Wood chopping

Resources are essential, and wood plays a crucial role in your survival. Players can chop down trees to gather wood, which is used to build shelters, fortify defenses, and craft essential tools.

Weapons

Players can arm themselves with a wide range of weapons, from handguns to high-powered rifles, each with unique handling, range, and stopping power. The game allows you to fully gear up and customize your weapons to fit your survival style. Scavenge for attachments like scopes, extended magazines, suppressors, and grips to enhance performance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
